com.chunkr.expressions

Class Regressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chunkr.expressions.Regressor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscreteCosineRegressor, DiscreteFourierRegressor, LeastSquaresRegressor

    public abstract class Regressor
extends java.lang.Object
    Regressors are responsible for fitting a smooth curve (Expression) to a set of data points. Regressors are essentially curve fitters.
    Author:
    ashwin

    • Constructor Detail

      • Regressor

        public Regressor()

    • Method Detail

      • fit

        public abstract Expression fit(double[] points)
        Constructs an evaluable curve that best fits the specified data points. The x value is implied to be the index in the array; therefore, points must be organized in a uniformly equidistant, sequential manner.
        Parameters:
        chunks - integer chunks
        accuracy - accuracy of regression on [0.0, 1.0]
        Returns:
        evaluable expression

      • fit

        public final Expression fit(int[] points)
